description: Creates a new tag with the provided label if the tag does not exist.

params.name: options
params.doc: Options specifying which additional fields to return.

docs.summary: Gets a tag by the specified ID.
description:
The `getTag()` function returns a Promise that resolves to a tag whose ID matches the given ID.
>**Note**: Unless specified in the `options` parameter, the `URL` field is not included in the response object.

examples.title: Get a tag by ID with additional fields

params.name: options
params.doc: Options specifying which additional fields to return.

docs.summary: Gets a tag by the specified label.
description:
The `getTagByLabel()` function returns a Promise that resolves to a tag whose label matches the given label.

**Note**: Unless specified in the `options` parameter, the `URL` field is not included in the response object.

examples.title: Get a tag by its label
Get a tag by its label with additional fields

params.name: slug
params.doc: Slug of the tag to retrieve.

params.name: options
params.doc: Options specifying which additional fields to return.

docs.summary: Gets a tag by the specified slug.
description:
The `getTagBySlug()` function returns a Promise that resolves to a category whose slug matches the given slug.

The `slug` is the end of a tag's URL that refers to a specific tag. For example, if a tag's URL is `https://example.com/blog/tag/{my-tag-slug}`, the slug is `my-tag-slug`. The slug is case-sensitive and derived from the tag's `label`.

>**Note**: Unless specified in the `options` parameter, the `URL` field is not included in the response object.

examples.title: Get a tag by its slug
Get a tag by its slug with additional fields

docs.summary: Creates a query to retrieve a list of tags.
description: The `queryTags()` function builds a query to retrieve a list of up to 4,000 tags per language, and returns a [`TagsQueryBuilder`](https://www.wix.com/velo/reference/wix-blog-backend/tag/tagsquerybuilder?branch=autodocs-wix-blog-backend) object.

The returned object contains the query definition, which is typically used to run the query using the [`find()`](https://www.wix.com/velo/reference/wix-blog-backend/tag/tagsquerybuilder/find?branch=autodocs-wix-blog-backend) function.
You can redefine the query by chaining `TagsQueryBuilder` functions onto the query. `TagsQueryBuilder` functions enable you to sort, filter, and control the results that `queryTags()` returns.
`queryTags()` runs with these `TagsQueryBuilder` defaults that can be overridden:

The following `TagQueryBuilder` functions are supported for queryTags(). For a full description of the Tags object, see the object returned for the [`items`](https://www.wix.com/velo/reference/wix-blog-backend/tag/tagsqueryresult/items?branch=autodocs-wix-blog-backend) property in [`TagsQueryResult`](https://www.wix.com/velo/reference/wix-blog-backend/post/queryposts?branch=autodocs-wix-blog-backend).

examples.title: Retrieves a list of all tags

extra.description: This example uses the `queryTags()` function to retrieve all tags.
This example uses the `queryTags()` function to retrieve all posts that have a `postCount` less than 3.
